name: Super Keyboard Smasher
description:
My other games don't matter. Pay no attention to them. This is my MAGNUM OPUS, and that is no way a lie. In this once in a lifetime experience, you will be able to SMASH! TYPE! AND LAUGH your away through this amazing game! It's so great, it took me less than a month to make! Give it a try, unless you suck too hard!

WARNING

You probably all suck too hard. You will never do a "good job," and that's a fact.
